Created page with "{{Lead Sheet|<nowiki> {Title: Lay Be Down (Chris Tomlin)} {Intro} [G#m7] [F#/A#] [B] {Verse} With this [G#m7]heart open wide, from the [B]depths from the heights I will [G#..."

New page

{{Lead Sheet|<nowiki>
{Title: Lay Be Down (Chris Tomlin)}
{Intro}
[G#m7] [F#/A#] [B]

{Verse}
With this [G#m7]heart open wide, from the [B]depths from the heights
I will [G#m7]bring a [F#]sacri[B]fice
With these [G#m7]hands lifted high, Hear my [B]song, hear my cry,
I will [G#m7]bring a [F#]sacri[B]fice, I will [G#m7]bring a [F#]sacri[E]fice [B]

{Chorus}
[E2]I lay me [B]down I’m not my [F#]own, I [G#m7]belong to [F#]you a[E]lone
Lay me [B]down, lay me [F#]down,
[E2]Hand on my [B]heart this much is [F#]true, there’s no [G#m7]life a[F#]part from [E]You
Lay me [B]down, lay me [F#]down
[E2]Lay me [B]down, lay me [F#]down

{Verse}
Letting [G#m7]go of my pride, giving [B]up all my rights
Take [G#m7]this life and [F#]let it [B]shine, take this [G#m7]life and let it [E]shine [B]

{Bridge}
It will be my [B]joy to say "Your will Your way"
It will be my [G#m7]joy to say "Your will Your way"
It will be my [F#sus]joy to say "Your [E]will Your way [B]always


</nowiki>
}}
